Tech Specs

Phases

Single and three phase options

Rated Output

3.6kW

7kW

22kW

Connectors

SAE J1772 connector

IEC 62196 connector

Size

Dimensions: 360mm, depth = 150mm

Weight: 6.5kg

Colour

Black and Grey

Features
  • The status of the charge point is shown by coloured status lights.
  • Communicating variants of the chargepoint are compatible with the POD Point MIS.

Warranty

We have got you covered with maintenance and support for 3 years at no extra cost. If your POD Point smart charger is broken one of our experts will come over and fix it, if it canâ€™t be fixed we will swop the unit for another one.

Safety

Our chargepoints are designed and tested using BS EN 61010 & BS EN 61557 approved equipment to meet the following European safety & functionality standards for electrical devices.

The POD Point chargepoint also provides internal over-current protection in addition to the other safety features.
